dcterms:creator: K. Soomro
A. R. Zamir
M. Shah
dcterms:description: The UCF-101 dataset comprises 13320 realistic video clips collected from YouTube and covers 101 categories of human actions, such as punching, boxing, and walking. It has three distinct official splits for evaluation.
dcterms:title: UCF-101

dcterms:creator: H. Kuehne
H. Jhuang
E. Garrote
T. Poggio
T. Serre
dcterms:description: The HMDB-51 dataset contains roughly 5k videos belonging to 51 distinct action classes, with each class holding at least 100 videos collected from multiple sources, including movies and online videos.
dcterms:title: HMDB-51

dcterms:creator: W. Kay
et al.
dcterms:description: The Kinetics-400 dataset consists of 400 human action classes with at least 400 video clips for each action, totaling about 240k training videos and 20k validation videos, all sourced from YouTube.
dcterms:title: Kinetics-400
